Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.31212183] Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus A270 (MIC=1.6 μmol/L), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC=1.6 μmol/L), Bacillus megaterium ATCC 10778 (MIC=0.8 μmol/L), Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC=0.8 μmol/L);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli SBS 363 (MIC=1.6 μmol/L)，Serratia marcescens ATCC 4112 (MIC=0.2 μmol/L), Enterobacter cloacae β-12 (MIC=6.3 μmol/L), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=12.5 μmol/L);Fungi:Candida albicans MDM8 (MIC=0.8 μmol/L), Candida tropicalis IOC 4560 (MIC=0.8 μmol/L)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.31212183] 25% hemolysis at 6.3 μmol/L, 50% hemolysis at 12.5 μmol/L, 70% hemolysis at 25 μmol/L, 90% hemolysis at 500 μmol/L for human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans and Candida tropicalis IOC 4562.

Literature.Title: Repurposing the scorpion venom peptide VmCT1 into an active peptide against Gram-negative ESKAPE pathogens
Literature.Author: Pedron CN, Araújo I, da Silva Junior PI, Dias da Silva F, Torres MT, Oliveira Junior VX
